Nibras Bawa has a diverse background. Having started in marketing with a B.S in Marketing heâ€™s had stints in Sales, Management, Project management and Consulting.

He is the founder/CEO at Bawa Labs, a Singaporean company with interests in emerging online recruitment, Web 2.0 technologies and social media. In his parallel life, he owns Sorchus, an integrated new media agency dedicated to social media, where he coaches and consults to government organizations, individuals and companies worldwide.

Nibras largely writes about web applications, blogging, pod casting, mobile content, interactive TV, online video, social networking, Web 2.0 technologies, and related areas. A geek to his very core, Nibras consults, trains and speaks about Internet marketing, blogging and new media at events, studies global technology, media and online trends and shapes them into actionable insights and web startup strategies. He travels the world evangelizing social media, speaks at and moderates panels at conferences, interviews nfluencers at industry gatherings.

Full time with Bawa Labs, Nibras is a marketer, entrepreneur, strategist, blogger, new media commentator, coach, speaker, trainer, new media writer, social media and Internet marketing consultant and all-round web addict. He also writes about emerging marketing and futurology on his personal blog.
